although it tastes sweet, the nutritional content of apples can control blood sugar levels
bananas should not be consumed because they contain carbohydrates that increase blood sugar
Corn is good for consumption as a substitute for rice because it has a higher amylose
oranges are good for diabetics because they are rich in fiber and low on the glycemic index
Peaches are low in calories and have 10 different vitamins including vitamins A and C
Strawberries are low glycemic so they can help maintain blood sugar levels
watermelon has good nutrition but has a glycemic index that can increase blood sugar levels

FyDia is an application to detect fruits or vegetables that are safe for diabetics. FyDia will tell users whether the fruit or vegetable consumed is safe or not, besides that FyDia will also give a little explanation
